# Initial preparation of the data

```{r}

setwd("~/Documents/Work/HFSP_2022")

library(tidyverse)

# read in the preliminary data set sent by Alex H. on Dec 7th

jan_24_data <- read_csv('Jan_24_2022_data/statistical_test_export.csv')

# unique test labels

test_labels <- unname(unlist(unique(jan_24_data[,2])))

# Remove pST kinases and control

test_labels_pY <- test_labels[-grep('pST',test_labels)]
test_labels_pY <- test_labels_pY[-grep('LP',test_labels_pY)]

# subset data for pY only

jan_24_data_pY <- jan_24_data[unlist(jan_24_data[,2]) %in% test_labels_pY,]

# upregulated sites only

jan_24_data_pY_up <- jan_24_data_pY[unlist(jan_24_data_pY[,12]) %in% 'up',]

# upregulated Y only (FoldX can only do predictions for a single modification at a time,
# and so we will restrict ourselves to singly modified phosphopeptides )

jan_24_data_pY_up_Y <- jan_24_data_pY_up[unname(unlist(jan_24_data_pY_up[,16])) %in% 'Y',]

# frequency table of upregulated sites

Y_kinase_freq <- sort(table(unname(unlist(jan_24_data_pY_up_Y[,2]))))

Y_kinase_sorted <- names(Y_kinase_freq)
Y_kinase_sorted <- Y_kinase_sorted[-1]

# Remove one vSRC
Y_kinase_sorted <- Y_kinase_sorted[-31]

```

# Plot RSA per kinase

```{r}

library(viridis)

setwd("~/Documents/Work/HFSP_2022")

RSA_df_global <- NULL

for (i in 1:length(Y_kinase_sorted)) {
  
  print(i)
  
  Y_kinase <- Y_kinase_sorted[i]
  Y_kinase_tag <- rapply(strsplit(Y_kinase_sorted[i], split=' '), function(x) x[1])
  
  master_file_path <- paste('~/Documents/Work/HFSP_2022/master_files/',Y_kinase_tag,'_master.csv',sep='')
  master_file <- read_csv(master_file_path)
  master_file <- data.frame(master_file,stringsAsFactors = F)
  master_file <- master_file[!duplicated(master_file[,1:6]),]
  
  Y_kinase_group <- rapply(strsplit(Y_kinase_tag,split='-'), function(x) x[1])
  Y_kinase_tag <- rapply(strsplit(Y_kinase_tag,split='-'), function(x) x[2])
  
  master_file_RSA <- master_file$RSA
  RSA_df <- data.frame(rep(Y_kinase_group,nrow(master_file)),rep(Y_kinase_tag,nrow(master_file)),master_file_RSA, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
  colnames(RSA_df) <- c('Group','Kinase','RSA')
  
  RSA_df_global <- rbind(RSA_df_global,RSA_df)
  
}

# Remove values for which no AF2 model was available

RSA_df_global <- RSA_df_global[!RSA_df_global[,3] == 'no AF2',]
RSA_df_global$RSA <- as.numeric(RSA_df_global$RSA)

kin_name_default <- names(table(RSA_df_global$Kinase))
kin_name_sorted <- rapply(strsplit(Y_kinase_sorted, split=' '), function(x) x[1])
kin_name_sorted <- rapply(strsplit(kin_name_sorted, split='-'), function(x) x[2])

RSA_df_global$Kinase <- factor(RSA_df_global$Kinase, levels = c('TNK1','FES','TEC','SYK','ABL2','BMX','ABL1','LCK','FYN',
                                                                'FRK','SRC','LYN','MET','FGFR3','EPHA1','EPHB4','EPHA3',
                                                                'MERTK','EPHB3','FGFR2','EPHB1','L452A','V394A','L317A',
                                                            'V292A','L393A','V383A','vSRC','L360A','L451A','V329A','L491A','L435A','L308A','V281A'))

# Media + quartiles

median.quartile <- function(x){
  out <- quantile(x, probs = c(0.25,0.5,0.75))
  names(out) <- c("ymin","y","ymax")
  return(out) 
}

# Convert all RSAs > 1 to 1 (this is caused simply by Ys at protein termini). There are only 17 cases but I think they all correspond to the same phosphosite.



# Generate the violin plot

p <- ggplot(RSA_df_global, aes(x=Group, y=RSA, fill = Group)) + geom_violin(color='black', lwd=1.00, scale='width', width=0.55) + scale_fill_manual(values = c(rgb(49/255,104/255,142/255,128/255),rgb(53/255,183/255,121/255,128/255), rgb(253/255,231/255,37/255,128/255)))

p <- p +stat_summary(
    fun.data = median.quartile, color = colors()[180], lwd=0.75, show.legend = F)

# Font
p <- p+theme_bw() + theme(text=element_text(face="plain", size=15), panel.border = element_rect(color="black", size=1.2, linetype="solid"))

# Ticks
p <- p+theme(axis.ticks.length=unit(-0.10, "cm"), axis.text.x = element_text(margin=unit(c(0.2,0.2,0.2,0.2), "cm")), axis.text.y = element_text(margin=unit(c(0.2,0.2,0.2,0.2), "cm")))

p <- p + ylab("RSA") + xlab("") + ggtitle('')
#p <- p + theme(axis.title.y = element_text(vjust=-1.5))
p <- p+theme(axis.text=element_text(size=10.5),axis.title.x=element_text(size=16,face="plain"),axis.title.y=element_text(size=16,face="plain"),plot.title=element_text(size=18,face='bold'))
p <- p+theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
p <- p + scale_y_continuous(labels=c('0','','','','1'))
p <- p + theme(axis.ticks.y = element_line(color = c("black", NA, NA, NA,"black")))
p <- p+theme(axis.title.y = element_text(vjust=-7))
p <- p + theme(legend.position = "none",panel.border = element_blank()) # axis.line = element_blank(), )

# Threshold for accessibility is commonly posed between 15% and 25%

p <- p + geom_hline(yintercept=0.2, linetype="dashed", color = "red", lwd=0.7)

# Legend

p <- p+theme(legend.key.size = unit(0.5, 'cm'),legend.title = element_text(size=0), legend.text = element_text(size=8))

#p <- p + theme(plot.margin = unit(c(0,0,0.1,0), "cm")) # t, r, b, l
#p <- p + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 30, vjust = 1.0, hjust=1))

p <- p+geom_text(data=data.frame(), aes(x=c(1:3), y=rep(1.04,3)), label=c(unname(table(RSA_df_global[,1])))[1:3],col=colors()[190], fontface='plain', size=3.0, inherit.aes = FALSE)

ggsave(file='/home/david/Documents/Work/Bradley_et_al_2023/Structure_figure/1B_RSA.pdf', plot=p, width=3.0, height=4.0)


```
